full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHYEN GSUM GYI RNAM PA BRGYA DANG NGAN GSUM GYI RANG BZHIN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA LEGS BSHAD PADMA DKAR PO'I 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES MKHYEN GSUM GYI RNAM PA BRGYA DANG DON GSUM GYI RANG BZHIN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA LEGS BSHAD PADMA DKAR PO'I 'KHRI SHING ZHES BYA BA @009B 'DI NI, RIGS PA SMRA BA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'O, , SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
